title: Here's a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 that cover the concept of misinformation and methods to automatically detect misinformation and fake news

author.literal: **"The science of fake news"** - Lazer, D. M. J., et al.

title: *Science*. This article discusses the spread of fake news and the challenges in combating it
**"Fake news on social media: People believe what they want to believe when it makes no sense at all"**
*Journal of Economic Perspectives*. This paper explores the economics of fake news and its impact on society
**"The spread of true and false news online"**
*Science*. This study analyzes the spread of true and false news on Twitter
**"Detecting fake news in social media networks"**
note: *ACM Transactions on Intelligent Systems and Technology (TIST)*. This article reviews methods for detecting fake news on social media.

author.literal: **"A survey on fake news detection"** - Zhou, X., & Zafarani, R.

note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:1812.00315*. This survey provides an overview of fake news detection techniques.

title: **"Fake news detection on social media: A data mining perspective"**
*ACM SIGKDD Explorations Newsletter*. This paper discusses data mining techniques for fake news detection
**"Rumor detection on Twitter: A survey"**
note: *ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR)*. This survey covers rumor detection methods on Twitter.

title: **"Automatic deception detection: Methods for finding fake news"**
*Proceedings of the Association for Information Science and Technology*. This paper reviews automatic deception detection methods
**"The role of the crowd in countering misinformation: A case study of the COVID-19 infodemic"**
note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:2006.03154*. This study examines the role of crowdsourcing in countering misinformation during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: **"Combating fake news: A survey on identification and mitigation techniques"**
note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:1804.00064*. This survey discusses techniques for identifying and mitigating fake news.

title: **"Fake news detection using deep learning"**
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2017 ACM on Conference on Information and Knowledge Management*. This paper presents a deep learning approach to fake news detection

title: **"A survey on automatic fake news detection: A data mining perspective"**
*ACM Computing Surveys (CSUR)*. This survey provides a comprehensive overview of automatic fake news detection methods

author.literal: **"The rise and fall of fake news"** - Tandoc, E. C., Lim, Z. W., & Ling, R.

title: *Journalism Studies*. This article explores the lifecycle of fake news
**"Fake news detection on social media: A systematic literature review"**
note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:1809.01712*. This literature review covers various fake news detection methods.

title: **"The impact of misinformation on public health during the COVID-19 pandemic"**
*The Lancet*
note: This article discusses the impact of misinformation on public health during the COVID-19 pandemic.

title: **"Detecting fake news with machine learning: A systematic review"**
*Expert Systems with Applications*. This review focuses on machine learning techniques for fake news detection

author.literal: **"The spread of misinformation online"** - Del Vicario, M., et al.

title: *Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences*. This study analyzes the spread of misinformation on social media
**"Fake news detection: A hybrid CNN-RNN based deep learning approach"**
container-title: *Proceedings of the 2017 ACM on Conference on Information and Knowledge Management*
note: This paper presents a hybrid deep learning approach for fake news detection.

title: **"The role of social media in the dissemination of fake news"**
This article discusses the role of social media in spreading fake news
**"A survey on misinformation and fake news in social media"**
note: *arXiv preprint arXiv:1804.08559*. This survey provides an overview of misinformation and fake news on social media.

title: These articles provide a comprehensive overview of the challenges and methods related to misinformation and fake news detection
